data.name: Walk Hero Demo
data.detailed_description:
Go forward. Kill enemies. Collect loot. Get stronger. And again.


An unusual mix of genres will allow you to focus solely on the choice of equipment and upgrades.
data.about_the_game:
Go forward. Kill enemies. Collect loot. Get stronger. And again.


An unusual mix of genres will allow you to focus solely on the choice of equipment and upgrades.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Pentium 4 or higher, 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
